Defendant who rented a vehicle at the Laredo International Airport, which was registered to Dallas-Fort Worth
Defendant who elicited testimony from Santiago Hinojosa about rental car registrations
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Santiago Hinojosa: Manager with the Hertz rental car company at the Laredo International Airport, testified that rental vehicle registrations do not necessarily coincide with the location where the car was rented
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Jorge Luis Trevino: United States Border Patrol Agent who testified on cross examination about his knowledge of Hertz rental car locations
